text: Nīṅkaḷ toḻukaiyai muṭittuk koṇṭāl, niṉṟa nilaiyilum, irunta iruppilum, vilāppuṟaṅkaḷiṉ mītu (paṭuttirukkum) nilaiyilum allāhvai tikru ceyyuṅkaḷ;. Piṉṉar nīṅkaḷ (āpattiṉiṉṟu viṭupaṭṭu) amaitiyāṉa nilaikku vantatum, muṟaippaṭi toḻutu koḷḷuṅkaḷ - ēṉeṉil, niccayamāka kuṟippiṭṭa nēraṅkaḷil toḻukaiyai niṟaivēṟṟuvatu muḥmiṉkaḷukku vitiyākkap peṟṟuḷḷatu
